content: The two errors below are felt to be due to a Questionnaire rendering issue in Publisher. We had hoped that they would resolve with the latest Publisher release, but they did not.
Same - I think @Grahame Grieve is aware : https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179252-IG-creation/topic/Questionnaire.20Rendering.3A.20icon-q-coding.2Epng

Interesting, I've looked into this issue much more closely, and the tree is being rendered as an R5 questionnaire, even when the source is an R4 questionnaire - the specific place this makes a difference is on the type column, where you don't see the R4 value of choice/open-choice.
fixed next release. both the missing icon, and wrongly using R5 types
